# GitHub Issue Templates - Coding Agent Review Findings

This directory contains 19 issue templates ready to be created as GitHub issues.

## Quick Start

To create these issues on GitHub:

1. Go to https://github.com/cbruyndoncx/awesome-comparisons/issues/new
2. Copy the content from each issue file (issue-01 through issue-19)
3. Paste into the issue form
4. The title and labels are in the frontmatter at the top
5. Click "Submit new issue"

## Priority Order

### Priority 1 - Critical (Create First)
- `issue-01-goose-url.md` - Wrong URL for Codename Goose
- `issue-02-smol-mcp-tessl.md` - MCP/Tessl confusion
- `issue-03-claude-desktop-spec.md` - Product confusion

### Priority 2 - High
- `issue-04-coderabbit-localoffline.md` - Contradictory LocalOffline
- `issue-05-goose-hooks.md` - Contradictory Hooks
- `issue-06-smol-localoffline.md` - Contradictory LocalOffline
- `issue-07-claude-desktop-byok.md` - Inconsistent BYOK

### Priority 3-4 - Medium
- `issue-08-classification-review.md` - Classification criteria
- `issue-09-malformed-versions.md` - Version numbers

### Priority 5-6 - Medium
- `issue-10-mcp-client-fields.md` - Empty MCP fields
- `issue-11-byok-localoffline-fields.md` - Empty BYOK/LocalOffline
- `issue-12-devin-extensibility.md` - Devin empty fields
- `issue-13-codiumai-mcp-claim.md` - Unverified MCP claim
- `issue-14-devika-naming.md` - Product naming
- `issue-15-amp-repository.md` - Repository confusion
- `issue-16-diffblue-slash-commands.md` - Slash command confusion

### Priority 7-8 - Low
- `issue-17-spec-driven-sections.md` - Empty SpecDrivenDevelopment
- `issue-18-unknown-values-format.md` - Format standardization
- `issue-19-language-support.md` - Language support clarity

## Automation Option

If you prefer to bulk-create these issues, you could use the GitHub API with a script, or use GitHub's issue import feature if available.

## Labels Used

Make sure these labels exist in your repository:
- `data-quality`
- `critical`
- `research-needed`
- `template-improvement`
- `good-first-issue`
